title: Lights Out(Special Interest-Documentary)
description: Our planet is lit up 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. We're addicted to light of all kinds, and like anything else that's addictive, is too much a bad thing? Lights Out! Joins leading scientists in the lab and in the field to discover how much harm light at night may be causing people and to learn about the ground-breaking steps being taken to protect us.
